name: Slow-SlimeSlam
description:
YOU do not have a sword or a shield, but your AI-clone (who's chasing you) does

Your AI clone will take out all enemies if HE touches them

the goal is to take out as many enemies as possible before YOU get knocked out.

You move with the arrow keys, WASD does not work

I invented and made everything myself, and I am 10 years old
